full_text:
Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 751 Filed 08/10/22 Page 178 of 261 1339
LC6Cmax5 McHugh - cross
1 account is?
2 A. Yes.
3 Q. A trust account - I'm generally summarizing - it holds money for a beneficiary of a trust, but that account is actually controlled by a third party; right?
4
5 MS. MOE: Objection, your Honor.
6
7 THE COURT: Overruled.
8 A. Can you repeat the question, please.
9 Q. So in a trust account, the money is held in an account for a beneficiary of the trust, but the account is actually controlled by a third party; isn't that right?
10
11 A. There are many types of trusts, but generally, a general description.
12
13 Q. What I just described is a type of trust account; is that accurate?
14
15 A. Yes.
16
17 Q. And it is possible to set up a trust account for someone without them even knowing; is that right?
18
19 MS. MOE: Objection, your Honor.
20
21 THE COURT: Sustained.
22 MR. EVERDELL: Your Honor, may I have a moment to confer with the government?
23
24 THE COURT: Yes. Members of the jury, if you would like to take a standing break, you're welcome to.
25 All right, please be seated.
SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300
DOJ-OGR-00018515
